summary: The Emotions is an all female American R&B group who are well known for their hit single "Best of My Love".
full_text: The Emotions are an American female Soul/R&B singing group from Chicago, Illinois, originally consisting of three sisters; Wanda Hutchinson, Sheila Hutchinson and Jeanette Hutchinson. The sisters are all children of Joseph and Lillian Hutchinson.
title: The Emotions
